reuters.title: Bundesbank has no interest in higher capital market rates - Poehl
reuters.body: Bangladesh Petroleum Corp said it floated an international tender for imports of two mln barrels of Jet Kero, Superior Kero and High Speed Diesel for shipment during January-June 1988. It said the offer for the petroleum products would be open until 0600 gmt on November 19. REUTER 
